code: export var sendToServer=function sendToServer(foodname,foodimage){var backend='http://localhost:5000';var xhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();var res;xhttp.open("POST",backend+'/meals',true);var request={'mealName':foodname,'mealPhoto':foodimage};xhttp.onreadystatechange=function(){if(xhttp.readyState===4){res=JSON.parse(xhttp.response);console.log(res);return res;}};xhttp.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/json');xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(request));};
